channel.title: Matrix
channel.description:
Do what you want with this. Currently 718/723, I wont release the cache editor. My exdevelopers tryed to hack server again by hacking my dropbox acc so all i have to say is two words: I quit.
Client: http://uppit.com/aolofapcc26n/718_Client.rar [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/32e3e9f1dwwd/n/718_Client.rar]http://www.filefactory.com/file/32e3e9f1dwwd/n/718_Client.rar[/url]
Server: http://uppit.com/sge8n7vcz8ha/Matrix718.rar [url=http://www.filefactory.com/file/3yna38qmxbg7/n/Matrix718.rar]http://www.filefactory.com/file/3yna38qmxbg7/n/Matrix718.rar[/url]
Six more words: I created Matrix, I end Matrix.
What i did: Pots Fight Kiln Nomad Fight caves Crucible Dominion tower Most of player combat Quick chat Private messages Public chat Player and NPC Update Price check Musics System and handled all musics myslef Skills xp counter and xp droping Trade Prayer including drain rates and effects and quick selecting Equiping and equipments loaded rom ache auras bank degrading cutscenes system and most of cutscenes dialogues system and most of dialogues Friend and ignore list Hint icons system Emotes book All agility courses that are coded Start on construction Start on ddungeonnering Fading screen Fishing spots handling Food Living rock Caverns Magic (all runes check , teleing etc) Runecrafting praticaly(tyler worked on runespan but i remade alot his code) Shops Skill Capes Customizing Skill dialogues Auras Castle wars Fight pits Barrows Corporeal Beast King black dragon Kalphite queen and lair basicaly All the tutorial Island that is done Start tutorial Wilderness Godwars Bonfire Mining Thieving stalls Helped with cook abit Firemaking GemCutting HerbCutting HomeTeleport(remad t completly) Player Follow Rest Helped alot on summon praticaly all famíliar class and multi check etc Woodcutting Interfaces manager(fixed rezizable tc) Tasks system Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc) Controlers system Poison Hits Walk Spawned objects Droped items Projectiles clip IPBanning ItemBonuses ItemExamine DisplayNames Update server Integrated RSA NPCBonuses NPC Combat Definitions Map Areas Falador Giant Mole Player Looks(Haircutter, skin changing,gender, and cloths changing) Figured all the client packets this source uses protocol Made all the network The core structure Encrypted maps ith own xteas Music hints Restarting And much more
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/wltyeh.png[/img] Dont I fucking deserve to at least be able to release the source i created since as you can see most of work was done by me?

item.title: Matrix
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:850, topic:449366”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=552262.msg4296017#msg4296017 date=1368233918]
A warning to everyone:

-there is a chat exploit in this that will make all accounts vulnerable
-there is a packet exploit that was released by Vincent also so be VERY careful.
[/quote]
Wasn’t there a patched version or at least a guide on how to resolve those issues not too long ago?[/quote]I recently downloaded this and have been going through a little bit at a time…there are SEVERAL and I do mean several dupes/exploits in this. I mean good lord I thought PI was horrible but good God…

Edit: quite frankly…I wouldn’t even suggest using a rune evo/matrix base what so ever. Dragonkk did an amazing job on this server but his developers have ruined it. I do admit though it’s sort of fun to solo by yourself.

Read full topic
